ygData.subject: Trueshot Bow
ygData.msgSnippet: Well hello fellow fletchers.  This is a semi-rant, so please pardon it. I have, I think, decided that I am not making anymore Trueshot Bows for anyone.  I am
ygData.messageBody:
Well hello fellow fletchers. This is a semi-rant, so please pardon it.

I have, I think, decided that I am not making anymore Trueshot Bows for
anyone. I am getting tired of the endless parade of idiots in Norrath that
think my price of 300pp (gone up since I have to now actually gather the
parts, or argue with some newbie in Greater Faydark over the value of the
staff, which I would gladly pay 50pp for - more than fair in my opinion for
a 5th level character). The typical conversation goes like this.

Me: /auction Trueshot Bow 20 Dam 100 Rng 45 Del 300pp (Ranger Only)

Idiot: /ooc or /auction or /shout Why are you charging so much for a bow
that costs 1pp to make?

Me: /ooc Well first of all it costs around 15pp per attempt, not to make it,
so on average I would say it's closer to 20pp per bow. Second, would you
mind telling me where you get Planing tools for 1pp? This would save me a
great deal of money in the long run. And thirdly, why do you want to know
you are a rogue/warrior/paladin/..... (anything but a ranger normally), and
this is a ranger only bow.

Idiot: /auction So why are you charging so much for it? You suk, you are a
greedy bastard, (I have forgotten the list, but you get the idea), it only
takes master fletcher to make it.

Me: /ooc And I assume that you think I was simply created with this skill at
the master level? If not, then you must assume that it cost me nothing to
get to this level of fletching?

Idiot: /auction Well it's pretty cheap to raise the skill, cost a friend of
mine only 50pp to get to master.

Me: /ooc Hmmm interesting, cost me a lot more than that to do it. I am
nearing 200 skill and still fail the bow around 40% of time when I try to
make it.

Idiot: /auction Well I think you suk and are just gouging people for money
that you don't deserve.

Me: /ooc Oh and how exactly is it that the Polished Granite Tommy can sell
for 300pp when it cost the person selling it 0pp to make it?

Idiot: /auction Yeah well that's different cause they are so hard to get and
you have to camp the place for hours

Me: /ooc And how exactly is this different from me having to gather the
parts, and camp the Arrow Vendor for hours to get my skills up?

/who idiot
No characters match the dsecription in this zone.


Other conversations involve people telling me that my 250pp to 200pp price
is high just to hit the combine button, I am sure you have all heard them
before.

Sorry Povar, get someone else to make your trueshots for now, I have had it.


Vapn Maistre, Master of all weapons, Master Fletcher, Povar
